All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
ApiException
The ApiException class contains custom API error details
ApiResponse
The ApiResponse class provides custom response
AuthController
This class authenticates against user's login or register details.
AuthResponse
Custom response for successful authentication
AuthService
Interface contains methods for user authentication.
AuthServiceImpl
The AuthServiceImpl class provides an implementation of AuthService Interface methods
CustomUserDetails
The CustomUserDetails class implements UserDetails Interface
CustomUserDetailsService
An Implementation service class of UserDetailsService
ErrorDetails
The ErrorDetails class contains custom error details
GlobalExceptionHandler
The GlobalExceptionHandler class handles all exception.
InitDatabase
The InitDatabase class add values into user table
Login
This class is used for login.
Register
This class is used for user's registration.
ResourceNotFoundException
The ResourceNotFoundException class is a RuntimeException for none-exists resources.
SecurityConfig
This class contains necessary spring boot security configures
Task
The Task class contains task details.
TaskController
This class manages tasks like Creation, Deletion, Update, and Read.
TaskManagementSystemApplication
The TaskManagementSystemApplication class is root class.
TaskRepository
Interface for handles database operations
TaskService
Interface contains several methods for Task.
TaskServiceImpl
The TaskServiceImpl class provides an implementation of TaskService Interface methods
User
The User class contains user's details.
UserRepository
Interface for handles database operation against user table
